programme.title: Vägev värk
programme.sub-title: Miks sõrmed vees ligunedes krimpsu tõmbavad?

programme.title: Kõnnumaalased
programme.desc: Savukoskis algab Soome mainekaim jahikoerte võistlus Riistakoira. Kõrget kohta sihivad ka Antti ja Hopi. Paavo ja Johannes on võib-olla viimast korda koos varitsuses. Yifeng ja Juuso on esmakordselt kohapüügil koos kogenud kapteniga, kellel jätkub teadmisi nii kaladest kui ka kalapüügiga seotud ebausust.

programme.title: Okavango – unistuste jõgi
programme.desc: Sarja kolmandas osas jõuab Okavango teekond lõpule. Jõgi võtab tagasi kõik, mis ta on andnud, jättes järele soola ja toitaineid, mida tuhanded loomad tulevad kaugelt otsima. See on habras maailm, kus tantsivad miraažid, tõelised ja kujuteldavad. See on põrgu, kus kõrvetav päike on maa kõvaks kuivatanud. Emaleopard Moporoto kasvatab oma poegi ja talub pidevaid muutusi, olles kogu aeg liikvel. Okavango, unelmate jõgi, haihtub siin olematuks...

programme.title: Kultuuristuudio. Arutelu
programme.desc: Saatesari "Kultuuristuudio. Arutelu" teine hooaeg keskendub nüüdki päevakajalistele kultuuriteemadele. Lahkame probleeme ning otsime muredele lahendusi tuues teoreetikud ja praktikud kokku. Saatejuhid on Maarja Vaino, Tarmo Tiisler ja Kaupo Meiel. Režissöör Andres Lepasar.

programme.title: Laulud rebasele
Dainos lapei
programme.desc: R: Kristijonas Vildziunas. Kui rokkar Dainius (Lukas Malinauskas) oma naise kaotab, eraldub ta üksildasse maamajja, mis asub keset raba. Seal hakkab Dainius praktiseerima teadlikku unenägemist, lootes, et unenägudes on tal võimalik taas oma kallimaga kohtuda. Dainius sõbruneb ka kohaliku poisikesega, keda kasutavad ära kohalikud puskariajajad, ja aja möödudes hakkab poiss Dainiust tema unenäoreisidel aktiivselt abistama. Omapärane draama, mis põimib kokku fantaasia teispoolsusest, Orpheuse ja Eurydike müüdi, rokkmuusika ning postsovetliku väikelinna realismi.

programme.title: Kõnnumaalased
programme.desc: Savukoskis algab Soome mainekaim jahikoerte võistlus Riistakoira. Kõrget kohta sihivad ka Antti ja Hopi. Paavo ja Johannes on võib-olla viimast korda koos varitsuses. Yifeng ja Juuso on esmakordselt kohapüügil koos kogenud kapteniga, kellel jätkub teadmisi nii kaladest kui ka kalapüügiga seotud ebausust.

programme.title: Morsk ja vilepuhuja
The Walrus and the Whistleblower
programme.desc: Dokumentaalfilm kunagisest mereloomade dresseerijast Phil Demersist, kes süüdistas Kanada loomaparki Marinelandi oma asukate väärkohtlemises. Kui aga Marineland Demersi kohtusse kaebas, süüdistades teda plaanis nende morsk ära röövida, sai alguse pikk kohtusaaga, millest kasvas Demersi üllatuseks välja suur mereloomade vangistuse vastane liikumine.

programme.desc: Laevakass aitab Piraaditaril ja tema meeskonnal aardekaardi järgi peidetud varandust otsida.

programme.desc: Ollie peab minema oma seiklushimulise tädiga sushi’t sööma, kuid ta ei oska toidupulki kasutada. Kuu teeb ettepaneku sõita Jaapanisse, et seda kunsti kohapeal õppida.

programme.title: Nöps ja Mikk
programme.desc: Nöps disainis Helgile moeetenduse tarvis imelised kübarad. Mikk on fotograafiks ja Kalle ülesandeks on leida džunglis koht, kus etendus saaks toimuda. Kahjuks meeldivad kübarad aga ka kahele ulakale ahvikesele, kes peakatted näppavad ega taha neid enam tagasi anda.

programme.title: Väike nõid Zouk
programme.desc: Zouk peab osalema võistlusel, kus tema vastased järjepidevalt ainult sohki teevad. Kuna võlumine on keelatud, peab ta lootma ainult sõprade abile.

programme.title: Kollikool
programme.desc: Õpetaja korraldab vahva etenduse kollikooli rajaja auks.

programme.title: Zorro seiklused
The Cannons of Monterey
programme.desc: Kapten Monasterio toob Montereyst kaks kahurit, et sundida chumash’i hõime nende maadelt lahkuma. Don Alejandro de la Vega ja tema parim sõber don Luis de Villalonga otsustavad sõjaväele vastu astuda.

programme.title: NOVA
programme.desc: Kõigele põnevale, mis toimub koolis, trennis ja mida muidu vabal ajal ette võtta, annab vastused laste oma saade NOVA! Vaata meid esmaspäevast neljapäevani kas kell 16.45 või 18.45. Meie saatejuhtidele ja reporteritele saad oma ideid, soove ja küllakutseid saata e-posti nova@err.ee. Sarja toimetavad Laura Kõrvits ja Lota Viik, režissöörid Kristo Veinberg ja Maarja Pärsim.

programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: "Ringvaade" toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Grete Lõbu ja Marko Reikop.

programme.title: Eesti mäng
programme.desc: Täna on vastamisi õpetaja ja pikaaegne Prantsuse Lütseumi direktor Lauri Leesi, Nargenfestivali korraldusjuht Kadri Tikerpuu ning filmilavastaja ja näitleja Andres Puustusmaa. Saatejuht Gaute Kivistik. Assistent Britt Kõrsmaa, režissöör Maire Radsin.

programme.title: Pulss
programme.desc: Iiris otsib Niilole lapsehoidjat ja peab viimaks leppima Eetuga. Eetu on rõõmsalt nõus Niiloga õhtut veetma, kuid saab ootamatu telefonikõne. Ilmari tuleb tööle, kuid ei suuda keskenduda ja teeb ravivea. Johanna leiab, et sellest tuleks ka patsiendile teada anda, Ilmari tahab aga viga maha vaikida. Leevi käib Ella juures teraapias. Max üritab tegeleda isa mäluprobleemidega.

programme.title: Kõnnumaalased
programme.desc: Savukoskis algab Soome mainekaim jahikoerte võistlus Riistakoira. Kõrget kohta sihivad ka Antti ja Hopi. Paavo ja Johannes on võib-olla viimast korda koos varitsuses. Yifeng ja Juuso on esmakordselt kohapüügil koos kogenud kapteniga, kellel jätkub teadmisi nii kaladest kui ka kalapüügiga seotud ebausust.

programme.title: 4x4. Tadžikistan. Türkmenistan. Usbekistan
programme.desc: Reisiseltskonna seiklused Usbekistanis hakkavad lõppema ning järgmisena on ees ootamas uus, põnev ja paljukiidetud riik - Tadžikistan. Uus riik võtab automatkajad vastu heatujuliselt ja lahkelt. Testimisse läheb kohalike meeste antud vahva roheline pulber ja kõikvõimalikud lummavad ning põnevad mägiteed. Tootja Matkafilm OÜ.

programme.title: Kultuuristuudio. Kirjandusministri juures
programme.desc: Mart Juur viib läbi meeleolukad vestlused meie tuntud kirjanikega.

programme.title: Hollywood Viinis
Hollywood in Vienna 2022. The Film Music Gala from the Wiener Konzerthaus
programme.desc: Broadway ja West Endi tähed teevad kummarduse kaheksa Oscarit võitnud heliloojale Alan Menkenile. Kõlab muusika tuntud filmidest nagu „Väike merineitsi“, „Kaunitar ja koletis“, „Rapuntsel“ ja paljudest teistest. Viini Raadio Sümfooniaorkestrit juhatab Michael Kosarin.

programme.title: Ninjakunstnik
programme.desc: Täna näitab Ricky, kuidas vanadest sokkidest vahva mänguloom meisterdada, kuidas ehitada Calderist inspireeritud mängukarussell ja kuidas teha muumiakunsti.

programme.title: Džungliässad
programme.desc: Miniässad lähevad Põrsatüüka laagrisse kunsti õppima ja kohtuvad noore kaelkirjaku Blekiga, kes on samuti suur kunstihuviline. Kahjuks ei suuda õpetaja Salvador tema loomingut õiglaselt hinnata… kuni Lola aitab õpetajal leida õige vaatenurga.

programme.title: Kohtume Pariisis
programme.desc: Max ei välju operatsiooni järel toast, nii et Lena ja Jeff jätavad korraks erimeelsused, et ta tuju tõsta. Kui Blokk saab uue väljakutse, hakkavad aga mõlemad oma trupiga treenima. Thea võitleb ebatavalise rolli nimel.

programme.desc: Kõigele põnevale, mis toimub koolis, trennis ja mida muidu vabal ajal ette võtta, annab vastused laste oma saade NOVA! Vaata meid esmaspäevast neljapäevani kas kell 16.45 või 18.45. programme.desc: Suure Kotka abiga päästab Yakari hätta sattunud Vikerkaare.

programme.title: Väike nõid Zouk
programme.desc: Zouk ja Jojo lähevad tülli ning Zouk ei oska oma pahameelega toime tulla.

programme.title: Piraaditar ja Capitano
programme.desc: Piraaditar ja Capitano võistlevad, kumb neist saab nimeta saarele nime anda, aga üks pahatahtlik mereröövel loobib neile kaikaid kodaratesse.

programme.title: Kollikool
programme.desc: Kollid etendavad nukuteatrit, aga üks neist pingutab veidi üle, püüdes kõik ise ära teha.

Spitball Wars
programme.desc: Angelo ja sõbrad püüavad end Manetti tatikuulide eest kaitsta, kuid seda teha pole sugugi kerge – kuulisõda käib tundide ajal ning härra Foot’ile ei tohi ju vahele jääda!

programme.title: Rantšo
programme.desc: Samantha väidab, et teda ründas hunt. Lena ja sõbrad leiavad hundi üles, ent kahtlustavad, et tema Samanthat ei rünnanud ning otsustavad hunti Samantha eest varjata.

programme.title: NOVA
programme.desc: Kõigele põnevale, mis toimub koolis, trennis ja mida muidu vabal ajal ette võtta, annab vastused laste oma saade NOVA! Vaata meid esmaspäevast neljapäevani kas kell 16.45 või 18.45. programme.title: Hei, turbod
programme.desc: Täna seiklevad turbod Saksamaal ja päästavad hävingust selle riigi pealinna kõige olulisema vaatamisväärsuse.

programme.title: Kõnnumaalased
programme.desc: Paavo saab kätte oma relvaloa ja on esmakordselt jahil linnukoeraga. Antti ja Hopi võistlus jätkub veekatsel. Manu sõidab pealinna, et aidata kolleege forellide märgistamisel ja kudemisjõe parandamisel. Yifeng võrdleb hiinlaste ja soomlaste toidukultuuri.

programme.title: Elu allpool nulli
programme.desc: Pakane on Arktika täielikult oma haardesse võtnud ning kõik toimetused nõuavad julgust katsetada ja eksida. Ainult need, kes on sihikindlad, suudavad sellistes tingimustes vastu pidada. Sue Aikensil tuleb toitu otsides võistelda näljaste kiskjatega. Jessie Holmes treenib uut kelgukoerte põlvkonda. Andy ja Denise rajavad elu kergendamiseks uue võimaluse energia saamiseks ning Ricko täiendab Huslia looduses asuva peatuspaiga varusid.

programme.title: Eesti imelised maamärgid
programme.desc: Noor andekas näitleja Maarja Johanna Mägi räägib, millist haruldast meelerahu ja enesega olemise võimalust pakub Alam-Pedja looduskaitseala oma looklevate jõevete ning avarate luhtadega. Selline keskkond aitab nii vaimu puhata kui ka värskeid mõtteid koguda.

programme.title: Mississippi hääled
programme.desc: Sarja kolmandas osas vaatame üle New Orelansi kultuuripärandi pärlid. Lisaks kõigele muule seostatakse New Orleansi ka paljude tuntud kunstnike, muusikute ja kirjanikega. Külastame ajalooliselt olulist Congo väljakut, uhket surnuaeda, kuhu on hauaplatsi valmis ostnud ka üks kuulus filmistaar, ning proovime ära, mida põneva nimega Sazeraki kokteil endast kujutab. Seejärel on aeg vägeva linnaga selleks korraks hüvasti jätta ja uute paikade poole sõitma hakata. Tootja Matkafilm OÜ, operaator, režissöör ja monteerija Väino Laisaar, produtsent Herbert Murd, koordinaator Kaisa Ling, sarja muusika Madis Aesma.

programme.title: Elu pärast elu
programme.desc: 1910. aastal sünnib Inglismaal tütarlaps, kes veidi teistel asjaoludel oleks äärepealt surnult sündinud. Kui Ursula kasvab, on tal pidevalt tunne, et on siin juba olnud ja teab, mis edasi saab. Nii on tal igas olukorras kaks valikut ja ta saab valida paljude elude vahel.

programme.title: Elu pärast elu
programme.desc: Ursula vanemad on mures tütre veidrate unenägude ja ennustuste pärast ning viivad ta psühhiaatri juurde. Ursula vend saabub ta sünnipäevale koos oma Oxfordi sõpradega ja tutvus ühega neist toob kaasa saatuslikud tagajärjed.

programme.title: Kõnnumaalased
programme.desc: Paavo saab kätte oma relvaloa ja on esmakordselt jahil linnukoeraga. Antti ja Hopi võistlus jätkub veekatsel. Manu sõidab pealinna, et aidata kolleege forellide märgistamisel ja kudemisjõe parandamisel. Yifeng võrdleb hiinlaste ja soomlaste toidukultuuri.(n)

programme.title: Ivanna elu
Life of Ivanna
programme.desc: Noor neenetsi põhjapõdrakasvataja ja viie lapse ema Ivanna otsustab maha jätta oma abikaasa, kes töötas oma kodumaal Taimõri poolsaarel naftat ja gaasi kaevandavas ettevõttes. Nüüd on mees alkohoolik, sest pikka aega sai ta palga asemel viina. Ivanna alustab tundras elu ilma meheta, järgides neenetsi põhjapõdrakasvatajate eluviisi. Ellujäämiseks on ta sunnitud tegema tööd, mida traditsiooniliselt on teinud pered või mehed - ta hoolitseb põhjapõtrade eest, hoiab majapidamist ja kasvatab oma viit last nii, nagu oskab.(n)

programme.title: Eesti mäng
programme.desc: Täna on vastamisi õpetaja ja pikaaegne Prantsuse Lütseumi direktor Lauri Leesi, Nargenfestivali korraldusjuht Kadri Tikerpuu ning filmilavastaja ja näitleja Andres Puustusmaa. Saatejuht Gaute Kivistik. Assistent Britt Kõrsmaa, režissöör Maire Radsin.(n)

programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: "Ringvaade" toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Grete Lõbu ja Marko Reikop.(n)

programme.title: Eesti mäng
programme.desc: Täna selgub, kes on selle nädala võitja ja ühtlasi saatesarja viies poolfinalist. Saatejuht Gaute Kivistik, režissöör Maire Radsin.(n)

programme.title: Pulss
programme.desc: Max peab leppima mõttega, et tema suhe isaga pole enam kunagi endine. Haiglasse tuuakse dokumentideta iraaklane Dashti, kellega Ilmari tunneb omalaadset hingesugulust. Johanna räägib sapipõielõikusele tulnud patsiendile Ilmari tehtud raviveast. Iiris vihastab, kui saab teada, et Eetu on emaga kohtunud. Leevi ei oska oma tunnetes selgust saada.(n)

programme.title: Kõnnumaalased
programme.desc: Paavo saab kätte oma relvaloa ja on esmakordselt jahil linnukoeraga. Antti ja Hopi võistlus jätkub veekatsel. Manu sõidab pealinna, et aidata kolleege forellide märgistamisel ja kudemisjõe parandamisel. Yifeng võrdleb hiinlaste ja soomlaste toidukultuuri.(n)

programme.title: 4x4. Tadžikistan. Türkmenistan. Usbekistan
programme.desc: Sarja kaheksandas osas jätkub automatkajate seiklus mööda põnevat Tadžikistani. Külastatakse Dušanbe turgu, tutvutakse hiiglasliku hüdroelektrijaama tammi ja paisjärvega. Seejärel ootab ees kauaigatsetud Pamiiri "kiirtee" oma põnevate mägiradadega. Tootja Matkafilm OÜ.(n)

programme.title: Kultuuristuudio. Arutelu
programme.desc: Saatesari "Kultuuristuudio. Arutelu" teine hooaeg keskendub nüüdki päevakajalistele kultuuriteemadele. Lahkame probleeme ning otsime muredele lahendusi tuues teoreetikud ja praktikud kokku. Saatejuhid on Maarja Vaino, Tarmo Tiisler ja Kaupo Meiel. Režissöör Andres Lepasar.(n)

programme.title: Vihmane päev New Yorgis
A Rainy Day in New York
programme.desc: Kirevas ja mürarikkas suurlinnas kohtab poiss kunagist sõbratari, tüdruk aga satub kuulsuste boheemlaslikku maailma. Poiss on jõuka New Yorgi perekonna võsu, tüdruk on aga pärit Arizona väikelinnast. Manhattanil kasvanud poiss soovib tüdrukule oma armastatud linna tutvustada ja tal avanebki selleks võimalus, kui tüdruk tuntud filmilavastajaga intervjuud tegema läheb. Ees seisab vihmane päev, mis muudab nende elu igaveseks. Filmi peaosades mängivad Timothée Chalamet ("Kutsu mind oma nimega", "Lady Bird"), Elle Fanning ("Teen Spirit: laula südamest", "Petetud"), Selena Gomez (“Neetud naabrid 2”, "Metsik koolivaheaeg"), Jude Law ("Kapten Marvel", telesari "Noor paavst"), Diego Luna ("Rogue One: Tähesõdade lugu", "Elumärgid"), Liev Shcreiber ("Päevavalgele", telesari "Ray Donovan") .(n)

programme.title: Ninjakunstnik
programme.desc: Ricky üllatuseks peavad kõik usinasti jõulupühi, kuigi jõulud pole veel üldsegi käes! Mis siis temalgi muud üle jääb, kui jõulukunsti teha...(n)

programme.title: Džungliässad
programme.desc: Gilbert on elevil: ta on projekteerinud tunneli, mis viib otse vulkaanist läbi ja peaks sel moel kõigi džunglielanike elu lihtsamaks tegema. Paraku selgub, et tema palgatud töödejuhataja don Pedro on teinud oma tööd ülejala ja pigem omakasule mõeldes….(n)

programme.title: Angelo reeglid
Spitball Wars
programme.desc: Angelo ja sõbrad püüavad end Manetti tatikuulide eest kaitsta, kuid seda teha pole sugugi kerge – kuulisõda käib tundide ajal ning härra Foot’ile ei tohi ju vahele jääda!(n)

programme.title: Kohtume Pariisis
programme.desc: Õpilased on Brüsselis Euroopa koreograafide Grand Prix’l. Lena läheb Londoni trupi liidriga karvupidi kokku ja nad korraldavad tantsuduelli. Varsti ähvardab kõiki koolist väljaheitmine, nii et Lena kasutab oma kella, et asju parandada.(n)

programme.title: Oktonaudid
programme.desc: Peso on merel oma patsiente üle vaatamas, kui avastab parve meremadusid ehk kahevärvilisi pelamiide. Ootamatu torm uhub nad kõik tühjale saarele, kust meremaod enam omal käel vette ei saa. Kapten Valge ja teised oktonaudid tulevad appi, et vigastatud Peso loib lahasesse panna ja meremaod taas vette aidata.(n)

programme.title: Hei, turbod
programme.desc: Seekord uurivad turbod Antarktikat ja päästavad maailma suurima liustiku hävimisohust.(n)

programme.title: Indiaanipoiss Yakari
programme.desc: Grisli ja hunt seavad oma pojad vägikaigast vedades suurde ohtu.(n)

programme.title: Väike nõid Zouk
programme.desc: Jojo tahab teada, kas tal õnnestub nõiale hirmu nahka ajada, ent paraku on hoopis vaene härra Kõrvits see, kes Jojo tempude peale koledal kombel ehmatab.(n)

programme.title: Piraaditar ja Capitano
programme.desc: Roosa Pealuu meeskond peab jahti kapten Roheparra aardele, mis on maetud ühele saarele, kuhu on pea ilmvõimatu pääseda. Läheb vaja kõvasti julgust ja nutikust, et varandus üles leida.(n)

programme.title: Kollikool
programme.desc: Tiivussonile saab selgeks, miks tasub tunnis alati tähelepanelik olla.(n)

programme.title: Muumioru lood
programme.desc: Proua Filifjonka kaob salapäraselt ja koduvanast politseinik süüdistab selles Muumimammat. Muumipapa ja Muumitroll teevad kõik, et selgitada välja, mis tegelikult juhtus ning oma kalli mamma hea nimi puhtaks pesta.(n)

programme.title: Tere, maailm
programme.desc: Meil kõigil on kõrvakuulmine ja silmanägemine, aga mis asi võiks olla kõrvanägemine?(n)

programme.title: Morph
Hiccups
programme.desc: Morph vaevleb hirmsa luksumise käes ja Chas peab kiiresti sõbra murele lahenduse leidma.(n)

programme.title: Sisenemine keelatud
programme.desc: Lolo kardab, et Williami kaitseks välja astumine võib tema jaoks järjekordse sõpruse maksma minna….(n)

programme.title: Pipi Pikksukk
Pipi ja puusepp
programme.desc: Pipi koju satub usin puusepp, kes hea meelega parandaks kõike. Kahjuks pole Pipi temaga sugugi samal meelel.(n)

programme.title: Kõnnumaalased
programme.desc: Emilia ja Möro tutvuvad päästekoerte tegevusega Rovaniemis. Sanna ja Antti on Inaris kanalisi jahtimas. Manu ja Tero on sihile võtnud metssead. Paavol ja Johannesel on käes aasta põnevaim päev, sest algab põdrajaht.(n)

programme.title: Joanna Lumley seninägemata seiklused
programme.desc: Joanna Lumley külastab Kõzõlkumi kõrbe Usbekistani lääneservas ja Usbekistani rabavat pealinna Taškenti. Indias kohtub Joanna Lumley aukartust äratava dalai-laamaga.(n)

programme.title: Laske mind Lavale
programme.desc: Hariduslik-meelelahutuslik saatesari, mis jälgib kuue noore teekonda lavale. Mis neid näitleja elukutse juures paelub, miks soovivad nad oma elu teatriga siduda ning millistest väikestest ja suurtest väljakutsetest teatritöö koosneb? Kuuendas saates ootavad noori Vanemuise lavalauad ühes uute väljakutsetega. Kolmežanriteatrile vääriliselt saavad osalejad näidata oma muusikalisi ja tantsulisi osakusi. Žüriitoolidel istuvad Karol Kutnsel, Külliki Saldre ja Reimo Sagor.(n)

programme.title: Blair Witch
programme.desc: After discovering a video of what he believes to be his sister's experiences recorded in Blair's witch devilish woods , James and a group of his friends go there looking for his lost sister.

programme.title: Widows
programme.desc: Set in contemporary Chicago, during a period of chaos, four women with nothing in common except a debt left behind by their dead husbands' criminal activities, take fate into their own hands, and conspire to shape a future on their own terms.

programme.title: Going in Style
programme.desc: Willie, Joe and Albert are three retired senior citizens who are desperate to find money. As things get worse and the circumstances become more complicated, they begin to plan a bank robbery.

programme.title: French Kiss
programme.desc: When Kate's fiancé goes to Paris for a medical conference, he falls for another girl, which sends Kate after him to get him back. But when she ends up crossing paths with the thief Luc, her life turns upside down.

programme.title: Dying of the Light
programme.desc: With his career ending due to complications arising from old injuries sustained on the job, CIA agent Evan Lake goes on a revenge quest when he discovers that the man responsible for his injuries, a terrorist by the name of Banir, is still alive.

programme.title: The Spy Next Door
programme.desc: When he agreed to babysit his girlfriend's three kids, former CIA spy Bob Ho had no idea that this will end up being the most daunting task he ever took on. With three unwelcoming youngsters to win over, Bob Ho's mission gets more complicated when an old enemy arrives at his doorstep.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: Three beautiful girls are assigned to find someone who was kidnapped because of the important secrets that he has as well as recovering a software system that fell into the wrong hands before being exploited.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle
programme.desc: The three deadly angels are back, who have been trained in combat by their mysterious boss, as they are involved with dangerous groups, as they attempt to catch them while keeping themselves alive.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: Charlie's Angels always provided their investigative skills to their clients. Now Townsend Agency has highly trained women from around the world who work on the most challenging missions. When a systems engineer reveals information about dangerous technology, the angels must face this threat.

programme.title: Suicide Squad
programme.desc: A group of the most evil imprisoned villains on Earth, known as the Suicide Squad, make a deal with a corrupted government agency, to do high-risk missions, in return all the members of the team will have safety and protection in prison, plus some other benefits.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: Charlie's Angels always provided their investigative skills to their clients. Now Townsend Agency has highly trained women from around the world who work on the most challenging missions. When a systems engineer reveals information about dangerous technology, the angels must face this threat.

programme.title: A Case of You
programme.desc: Sam Newman, a writer, fails to get the girl of his dreams. He claims to be an athletic, courageous and charismatic person on social media to change his luck and succeeds in his plan and attracts his dream girl Birdie. Sam pretended to be someone else whenever around Birdie and eventually had to tell her the truth before it was too late.

programme.title: Secret Window
programme.desc: A strange man accuses a writer of stealing his story, and starts to pursue him. They both start to prove their ownership to the same story, but events take a turn for the deadly.

programme.title: Suicide Squad
programme.desc: A group of the most evil imprisoned villains on Earth, known as the Suicide Squad, make a deal with a corrupted government agency, to do high-risk missions, in return all the members of the team will have safety and protection in prison, plus some other benefits.

programme.title: Run All Night
programme.desc: An aging hitman is forced to assassinate his former brutal boss to protect his son and his family.

programme.title: Redemption
programme.desc: Ex-Special Forces soldier Joey returns to London from a tour in Afghanistan, a homeless, damaged veteran. Sucked into the city's criminal underworld, he assumes another man's identity and seeking redemption,he helps the poor and kills those who spread corruption.

programme.title: Den of Thieves
programme.desc: While planning a bank robbery, a thief is surrounded by two groups of dangerous criminals.

programme.title: Bad Times at the El Royale
programme.desc: Seven strangers, each holding a secret, meet at at Lake Tahoe's El Royale, a hotel with a dark past, and over one fateful night everyone will have a chance of salvation before everything goes to hell.

programme.title: Triple 9
programme.desc: A gang plans a big heist with a group of corrupt cops, by calling in a 999 dispatch, which is code for “officer down” to lure out a rookie officer, in order for them to pull-off their heist – their plan take unforeseen turns when an unsuspected member has a change of mind.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle
programme.desc: The three deadly angels are back, who have been trained in combat by their mysterious boss, as they are involved with dangerous groups, as they attempt to catch them while keeping themselves alive.(n)

programme.title: Kalifornia
programme.desc: Brian and Carrie are a journalist duo who go on a cross-country ride to research serial killer murder sites. They share the ride with Early Grayce and his girlfriend, and they later discover that Grayce is a deranged killer himself.(n)

programme.title: Bad Times at the El Royale
programme.desc: Seven strangers, each holding a secret, meet at at Lake Tahoe's El Royale, a hotel with a dark past, and over one fateful night everyone will have a chance of salvation before everything goes to hell.(n)

programme.title: The Lego Movie 2: The Second Part
programme.desc: With their world endangered by Lego Duplo invaders, Emmett, Lucy, and their friends embark on a journey to save their world from destruction.(n)

programme.title: Pokémon Detective Pikachu
programme.desc: When detective Harry Goodman, goes missing, his 21 year-old son, Tim, joins Harry's former Pokémon partner, the hilarious and adorable Detective Pikachu to find out what happened. Using their unique ability to communicate, they chase clues and uncover a shocking plot that may destroy their world.(n)

programme.title: Shazam!
programme.desc: The life of the foster child Billy Batson changes forever after the ancient wizard Shazam grants him the power to transform into an adult superhero, only to find himself chased by Dr. Thaddeus Sivana who is after his newfound powers.(n)

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows
programme.desc: The turtles are back again to save New York city, when scientist Baxter Stockman is working with Shredder to take over the city using the help of criminals from another dimension. The turtles work with April and Vernon to stop their evil plan.(n)

programme.title: Cast Away
programme.desc: Chuck works at a large courier company, and is in love with his girlfriend, Kelly. He plans to propose to her on Christmas, but is required to go to Malaysia for an urgent work assignment. The plane he's on crashes on the way, leaving Chuck as the only survivor on a deserted island, where it is up to him to protect both his own body and his own mind, by holding on to dreams of getting back.

programme.title: Cleaner
programme.desc: A former cop is drawn back to investigative work when his current business, a crime scene cleanup company, is tricked into erasing crucial evidence from a crime scene, sending him into a tailspin as he tries to uncover the truth of what happened.

programme.title: The Son of No One
programme.desc: The past comes back to haunt Jonathan, a rookie cop, after he is transferred to the neighborhood where he grew up, only for his captain to start receiving letters about an unsolved crime that Jonathan was involved in as a teenager.

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: Charlie (Wahlberg), Stella (Theron) and their carefully selected team, plan a gold bar heist against their former ally-turned-enemy, Steve.

programme.title: Mississippi Grind
programme.desc: Believing that his bad luck is the thing standing between him and his dreams, Gerry soon finds a companion in Curtis, a poker player whom Gerry believes is luckier than he is. Together, they team up and set out on a journey to New Orleans for a high-stakes poker game.

programme.title: Runner Runner
programme.desc: Broke college student Richie gambles online to pay his tuition. When he bottoms out, he travels to Costa Rica to confront the gambling mastermind Ivan (Ben Affleck), who he thinks scammed him. Richie gets drawn into Ivan's dangerous schemes.

programme.title: Molly's Game
programme.desc: After an injury ends her career, world-class skier Molly Bloom starts running an exclusive underground poker empire, but she soon lands herself in trouble after the FBI exposes her operation.

programme.title: A Simple Favor
programme.desc: Stephanie, a mother who works as a blogger, seeks to discover the mystery of the disappearance of her friend Emily from the city by joining her friend's husband, where everyone is subjected to love and loyalty tests and secrets that could cause murder and revenge.

programme.title: Step Up All In
programme.desc: After his team leaves him behind, Sean catches wind of a dance competition that could change everything for him. He sets out to create a new team, recruiting faces old and new, only to discover that he will be facing off against his old team in the competition.

programme.title: Runner Runner

programme.title: Molly's Game
programme.desc: After an injury ends her career, world-class skier Molly Bloom starts running an exclusive underground poker empire, but she soon lands herself in trouble after the FBI exposes her operation.

programme.title: The High Note
programme.desc: A famous singer and her hardworking assistant try to make a difficult choice, which could change the course of their careers forever.

programme.title: Yesterday
programme.desc: After a global blackout, a struggling musician shockingly discovers that he’s the only person on earth who remembers the world renowned music band, The Beatles.

programme.title: La La Land
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Mia, an ambitious actress, who serves lattes to movie stars in between auditions and Sebastian, a jazz musician, scrapes by playing cocktail party gigs in dingy bars, but as their success rises they are faced with decisions that begin to affect the fragile fabric of their love relationship, and the dreams they worked so hard to maintain in each other are started to threaten to rip them apart.

programme.title: Lady Bird
programme.desc: The coming of age story of Christina, a seventeen year old high school student, about to graduate from her catholic school, and is anticipating the journey and adventures to come.

programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen
programme.desc: The 17-year-old Nadine tries to make sense of the challenges thrown down her way as she grows up, suffering the depression of losing her father, and a shattered friendship with Krista who dates Nadine's brother, Darian. Nadine finds solace with her teacher, Mr. Bruner, and a talented classmate.

programme.title: Step Up China
programme.desc: In the heart of the Chinese city of Beijing, a group of young people who are passionate about dancing come together to form the best dance team in China and become a family.

As Tom tries to solve the mystery, he finds himself on the edge of insanity.(n)

programme.title: Takers
programme.desc: A group of robbers attempt to steal $20 million while a police officer gets in the way and events follow.(n)

programme.title: Criminal
programme.desc: A deceased CIA agent's skills are implanted in a convict called Jerico Stewart , with a dangerous profile and a highly unpredictable behavior.(n)

programme.title: Sicario
programme.desc: In the border stretching between Mexico and the U.S.A, an area that has been always out of the reach of law, an idealistic FBI agent is assigned to aid in the escalating war against the cartel.(n)

programme.desc: Sequel to the 2015 film (Sicario), where the drug war on the US-Mexico border has escalated as the cartels have begun trafficking terrorists across the US border.(n)

programme.title: The Duchess
programme.desc: A look into the life of the Duchess of Devonshire and her troubled marriage. Disillusioned by her husband's various affairs, the impatient expectancy of her to bear a male child and the public scrutiny, Georgina is broken down when her husband forces her to end her affair with Charles Grey.

programme.title: Il paradiso delle signore
programme.desc: The story of a poor girl from southern Italy who comes to Milan to escape from her cheating fiancé. She finds a job as a sales representative in a store, but quickly gets into trouble with her manager.

programme.desc: The story of a poor girl from southern Italy who comes to Milan to escape from her cheating fiancé. She finds a job as a sales representative in a store, but quickly gets into trouble with her manager.

programme.title: Me Before You
programme.desc: The story centers around a young woman working in a convenience store lived her life that she knows by counting the number of the steps to the bus stop down to the difficulty of accepting the love of her friend (Patrick). Unexpectedly she gets fired from work, while on the other side, a motorcycle accident occurred to the young (Will Traynor) prevent him from doing whatever he used in the past, consequently, their paths crosses, which results in making their lives happier and delighted.

programme.title: 13 Assassins
programme.desc: Set in 19th-century Japan; a samurai named Shinzaemon selects 11 assassins and a hunter to ambush and kill Matsudaira Naritsugu, an evil, corrupt lord, who is standing against his own people.

programme.title: The Expendables
programme.desc: Barney Ross leads a team of skilled mercenaries to assassinate a merciless dictator of a small South American island, only to find themselves caught in a dangerous web of betrayal.

programme.title: American Heist
programme.desc: After taking the fall for a crime that his brother committed with him, Frankie is released after serving his time, only to discover that his brother has gone on the straight and narrow. But the penniless Frankie has only one way of getting his life back: one last job that he drags his brother into.

programme.title: Kill Chain
programme.desc: In a hotel owned by a former mercenary, a number of seemingly unconnected people converge in a series of bloody encounters that can only be stopped by one man.

programme.title: Green Zone
programme.desc: US military officer Roy Miller goes rogue to find weapons of mass destruction in Iraq after discovering false intelligence confirming the absence of nuclear weapons in the region and how the United States was thrown into this long war.

programme.title: Solis
programme.desc: When Troy Holloway is trapped in a drifting escape pod headed to the sun, he realizes that the problem he's in is much bigger than he thought, as the oxygen is rapidly running out, his chances of survival are quickly declining.

programme.title: Rambo
programme.desc: Rambo, a retired veteran who now catches snakes for local entertainers and chauffeurs locals for a living in Thailand, joins a team heading into war-torn Burma for a rescue mission.

programme.title: Killers
programme.desc: Spencer is an undercover assassin who falls in love with Jen and he decides to retire and marry her. After several years, he finds huge reward to kill him, which makes him doubt everyone around him ,so he hides at Jen's father, who was also an assassin and he tries to help him.

programme.title: 13 Assassins
programme.desc: Set in 19th-century Japan; a samurai named Shinzaemon selects 11 assassins and a hunter to ambush and kill Matsudaira Naritsugu, an evil, corrupt lord, who is standing against his own people.

programme.title: Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery
programme.desc: After he has been cryonically frozen for almost 30 years, spy Austin Powers is released into a much-changed world, but his mission hasn't changed; he has to partner up with Vanessa Kensington to fight his implacable enemy, Dr. Evil.

programme.title: Beyond Skyline
programme.desc: A rigorous interrogator embarks on a brutal and unrelenting chase, trying to free his son from his hellish captivity in an alien warship.

programme.title: Olympus Has Fallen
programme.desc: Former presidential guard Mike Banning must step up when he finds himself in the White House in the midst of a terrorist attack. Only Banning has the inside knowledge national security forces will need to rescue the President from his kidnappers, and avert an even greater disaster.

programme.title: Hard Night Falling
programme.desc: When a gang invades the villa where he and his family are attending a party, an Interpol agent is in for the fight of his life as he has to go against a group of mercenaries to save all the hostages, including his own family.

programme.title: Survivor
programme.desc: A Foreign Service Officer who has recently been employed in the American embassy in London is charged with the mission to stop a terrorist attack targeting spots in New York city. But when she gets falsely charged with crimes she did not commit, she is forced to go on the run, trying to clear her name and also continue her original mission.

programme.title: The Courier
programme.desc: A courier in London who delivers packages, finds her life turn upside down when she discovers that she's transporting a bomb that's meant to kill an important witness named, Nick.

programme.title: 10 Minutes Gone
programme.desc: During a heist done wrong, Frank loses his brother and his memory in one go. Desperate to recall what happened, he embarks on a journey to learn what happened, all while he tries to evade his boss's hitmen.

programme.title: The Legend of Hercules
programme.desc: In Ancient Greece 1200 B.C., a queen succumbs to the lust of Zeus to bear a son promised to overthrow the tyrannical rule of the king and restore peace to a land in hardship. But this prince, Hercules, knows nothing of his real identity or his destiny. He desires only one thing: the love of Hebe, Princess of Crete, who has been promised to his own brother. When Hercules learns of his greater purpose, he must choose: to flee with his true love or to fulfill his destiny and become the true hero of his time. The story behind one of the greatest myths is revealed in this action-packed epic - a tale of love, sacrifice and the strength of the human spirit.

programme.title: Killers
programme.desc: Spencer is an undercover assassin who falls in love with Jen and he decides to retire and marry her. After several years, he finds huge reward to kill him, which makes him doubt everyone around him ,so he hides at Jen's father, who was also an assassin and he tries to help him.

programme.title: 13 Assassins
programme.desc: Set in 19th-century Japan; a samurai named Shinzaemon selects 11 assassins and a hunter to ambush and kill Matsudaira Naritsugu, an evil, corrupt lord, who is standing against his own people.

programme.title: Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery
programme.desc: After he has been cryonically frozen for almost 30 years, spy Austin Powers is released into a much-changed world, but his mission hasn't changed; he has to partner up with Vanessa Kensington to fight his implacable enemy, Dr. Evil.

programme.title: Survivor
programme.desc: A Foreign Service Officer who has recently been employed in the American embassy in London is charged with the mission to stop a terrorist attack targeting spots in New York city. But when she gets falsely charged with crimes she did not commit, she is forced to go on the run, trying to clear her name and also continue her original mission.

programme.title: The Courier
programme.desc: A courier in London who delivers packages, finds her life turn upside down when she discovers that she's transporting a bomb that's meant to kill an important witness named, Nick.

programme.title: 10 Minutes Gone
programme.desc: During a heist done wrong, Frank loses his brother and his memory in one go. Desperate to recall what happened, he embarks on a journey to learn what happened, all while he tries to evade his boss's hitmen.

programme.title: The Lost World: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: As John Hammond leads a team to explore the Jurassic Park's second site, an InGen team is sent there with a different agenda, and chaos ensues when the dinosaurs go wild.

programme.title: Gridlocked
programme.desc: David Hendrix is an ex S.W.A.T leader who must join forces with Brody Walker, a movie star shadowing him, as the two try to form the surviving members of a training facility into a team to combat a group of ruthless mercenaries that might just wreak havoc in the whole compound.

programme.title: London Has Fallen
programme.desc: Following the mysterious death of the British Prime Minister, Secret Agent Mike Banning does all he can to stop the planned attack, targeting to assassinate all western world leaders attending the funeral.

programme.title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
programme.desc: Roger is a cartoon rabbit accused of murdering his wife. His only hope lies in the help of a toon-hating detective.

programme.title: Wakefield
programme.desc: Howard Wakefield (Bryan Cranston) a successful New York City lawyer, goes through a bold turn in his family life. As he goes home from work one night ,and hides in his garage attic peeping from there, secretly watching the impact of his disappearance on his wife (Jennifer Garner) and family.

programme.title: From Paris with Love
programme.desc: A personal aide to the U.S. ambassador in Paris named James Reese teams up with the American spy Charlie Wax to thwart a terrorist attack.

programme.title: Happy New Year, Colin Burstead
programme.desc: After Colin rents a country house to enjoy New Year's Eve with his family, he feels threatened by the arrival of his estranged brother David.

programme.title: After Words
programme.desc: In a bid to overcome a crippling mid-life crisis, Jane takes a trip to Costa Rica, where love and adventure await her in the form of the younger Juan who turns her life upside down.

programme.title: The Clovehitch Killer
programme.desc: Ten years after a serial killer terrorized a local community, a young boy starts to suspect that his father is the infamous Clovehitch killer after he finds suspicious photos in his possession.

programme.title: Happy New Year, Colin Burstead
programme.desc: After Colin rents a country house to enjoy New Year's Eve with his family, he feels threatened by the arrival of his estranged brother David.

programme.title: The Way Back
programme.desc: Set in the beginning of the 1940's, three men escape from the Siberian militant camps in Russia and cross over all the way to India, a distance estimated to be around 4000 miles. During their journey, they are joined by a teenage girl and four other men, on a near-impossible mission.

programme.title: Long Shot
programme.desc: When Fred Flarsky reunites with his high school crush, Charlotte Field, now one of the most influential women in the world, a new spark is born between them. She hires him to write her speeches, as she prepares to run for US presidency.

programme.title: Bringing Down the House
programme.desc: Peter Sanderson is a lawyer who's divorced living with his kids . He meets a woman named Charlene, who escaped from prison after being accused of armed robbery. Peter tries to stay away from her, but she asks for his help in proving her innocence, and refuses to leave until he does.

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Danny has been enslaved his whole life without receiving proper education, so he has the mind and personality of a little child. He is a skilled fighter, and his owner, Bart, treats him like a guard dog, complete with a collar. When an accident leaves Bart in a coma, Danny meets a blind man who helps him change his point of view about life.
